title: ‘Atlanta’ Season 4, Episode 5 Recap
description:
Charles and Van take a close look at Tyler Perry’s reputation while breaking down the fifth episode of the final season of ‘Atlanta.’ The duo dives into what exactly Donald Glover is attempting to say about Tyler Perry as a filmmaker.
Hosts: Charles Holmes and Van Lathan
Associate Producer: Jonathan Kermah
